Title: Relates to directing the commissioner of education to develop certain information regarding for-profit institutions of higher education for the benefit of veteran students
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to establish a database of information on for-profit institutions of higher education and a system for grading such institutions for the benefit of veterans seeking post secondary education; requires for-profit institutions of higher education to prominently display on its website the letter grade most recently assigned.
LawCode: Amd ยง305, Ed L; amd ยง353, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the executive law, in relation to directing the commissioner of education to develop certain information regarding for-profit institutions of higher education for the benefit of veterans
